'''Sam''' may refer to:

*[[Sam]], the newborn son of [[Gilly]] and [[Craster]].
*[[Samwell Tarly]], a member of the [[Night's Watch]].
*[[Sam Callis]], an actor playing a [[Goldcloak on the Kingsroad]] in [[Season 2]].
*[[Sam Mackay]], an actor playing a [[Lannister guardsman (Garden of Bones)|Lannister guardsman]] in [[Garden of Bones]].
